title: TRANSFER ACCOUNT
body: I want to transfer my account i be waiting for this sooooo long, when will i be able to transfer GIVE ME A DATE

replies.body: I know it's been awhile and it really sucks not having a specified date set in stone about this, but we did get word that they should be back up late Jan/early Feb. Even still, you're welcome to hit up our agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to see what (if anything) could be done.

Still singing the same old tune eh Broporo, how bout you get this customer an actual date instead of dancing around the issue like every other thread that has been posted on this subject in the past 4 months? 

Although I'll probably get banned again for "hijacking this thread" or "bringing up old subjects" not my fault its taken Riot 4 months to fix something if they focused on would have probably taken a week. I sincerely hope you get an update Better Hide, you should probably also screenshot this comment since it will most likely be deleted and I'll be banned yet again for preaching how lame riot has been on this matter.

Spoiler alert, you won't be getting a timeline.

Cheers
